articles.author: Livemint
articles.title: OnePlus Nord CE 4 price tipped ahead of the launch: Here's everything we expect | Mint - Mint
articles.description: OnePlus Nord CE 4 rumored to start at  ₹24,999 with 8GB RAM + 128GB storage. Expected to feature Dark Chrome and Celadon Marble color variants. Boasting a 6.7-inch Fluid AMOLED Panel, Snapdragon 7 Gen 3 chipset, and 100W SUPERVOOC charging technology.
articles.content: The eagerly awaited OnePlus Nord CE 4 is set to hit the Indian market on April 1, with leaked price details sparking excitement among smartphone enthusiasts. Renowned tipster Abhishek Yadav has hinte… [+5843 chars]
